name: Midnight Seraph
description:
Midnight Seraph is a little space themed 3rds person shooter, mostly made to familiarize myself with Unity.

The game is currently unfinished, having only a short demo level, up to the first boss battle.

"Our heroine, Phoebe Gladys, self appointed captain of the Midnight Seraph, traveled to the ancient ruins in the Heracles-2A9 systems to scavenge some of the rare Nekral crystals that are rumored to be there. However, it appears that the (semi) nefarious Shade Corporation got there first ! And worst of all, they hired Phoebe arch-nemesis (and ex-girlfriend) Nemy Sirs ! In face of such situation, our heroine as decide to ignore the currently unenforceable part of the law and go collect the crystals for herself !"
